narrative:
*   This is a focused inspection limited to the three dogs cited under veterinary care section 2.40 b 2 as a direct
noncompliance on the March 12, 2015 inspection report.  The three dogs ( tag number 061, 104 and cocker dog
that had no identification on 3/12/15, now tagged as 0161)  were examined by a licensed veterinarian on March
23,2015.   Proper documentation was provided by the licensee.
* The focused inspection and exit briefing done on 3/24/15 were conducted with the licensee, Robert Bacon ACI
and Cindy Neis CS.
*   Copy of inspection report were sent by certified and regular mail. 
Additional Inspectors
Neis Cynthia, Compliance Specialist
